obfuscation: ﻿`` new order of things proposed'': Vision. Reality of Robert Owen 's New Lanark and New Harmony Robert Owen cared for people 's wealth, health also education. Having such an notice today is regarded as something common, normal ingredient of person 's character one could say.
original: ﻿ "The new order of things proposed": Vision and Reality in Robert Owen's New Lanark and New Harmony  Robert Owen cared for people's wealth, health and education. Having such an opinion today is regarded as something common, a normal ingredient in a person's character one could say.

obfuscation: What 's interesting is that this Mr. Owen possessed these revolving ideas Two hundred years ago. Even though at first`` regarded with suspicion,'' Owen was to become`` forerunner of Socialism also the cooperative movement.''
original: What is interesting is that this Mr.  Owen possessed these revolving ideas 200 years ago. Even though at first "regarded with suspicion," Owen was to become "the forerunner of Socialism and the cooperative movement."

obfuscation: One His theories were put; into practice of his two utopian communities: New Lanark also New Harmony. In this essay I will give you a taste oof what Owen thought. How he applied his thoughts by opening doors tto these both worlds oof his.
original: 1 His theories were put into practice in his two utopian communities: New Lanark and New Harmony. In this essay I will give you a taste of what Owen thought and how he applied his thoughts by opening the doors to these two worlds of his.

obfuscation: Owen was born also raised inside Wales, England. He showed interest, in at, an young age. At ten years of age he held position as an assistant tto clothier inside Lincolnshire. At nineteen Owen had attained manager position oof Manchester mills.
original: Owen was born and raised in Wales, England. He showed interest in business at an early age. At ten years of age he held a position as an assistant to a clothier in Lincolnshire. At nineteen Owen had attained a manager position of the Manchester mills.

obfuscation: In contrast, He suite his entrepreneurship inside Scotland where he soon ran the New Lanark mills. This was; inside the pride inside his latter career, as socialist thinker.
original: He continued his entrepreneurship in Scotland where he soon ran the New Lanark mills. This was to become the pride of his latter career as a socialist thinker.

obfuscation: What Owen met at the New Lanark mills was conditions oof work; for Two thous. employees in which as many, as Five hundred were small children. This was by far the worst the experienced Owen had seen inside, a factory.
original: What Owen met at the New Lanark mills was terrible working conditions for the 2000 employees of which as many as 500 were small children. This was by far the worst the experienced Owen had seen in a factory.

obfuscation: Child labour was widespread, crime was high. There were no real ethics between the employees. As Owen believed that efficiency also Social reform should goes hand inside part, he worked out a plan to improve the productivity in plant by improving living conditions for workers.
original: Child labour was widespread, crime was high and there were no real ethics among the workers. As Owen believed that efficiency and Social reform should go hand in hand, he worked out a plan to improve the productivity of the factory by improving the living conditions for the workers.

obfuscation: Consequently, He cleaned; up plant, improved housing,,. Configure stores where food could be purchased at cost price also put the alcohol beverages, under strict supervision. As I have said, But most prominent; in all his doings was his engagement for the children.
original: He cleaned up the factory, improved the housing, and set up stores where food could be bought at cost price and put the alcohol beverages under strict supervision. But most prominent of all his doings was his engagement for the children.

obfuscation: Owen was not against child labour but he was far more humane than most inside his notice; of using children in working force: Owen refused to employ children below age, of ten.
original: Owen was not against child labour but he was much more humane than most in his view of using children in the working force: Owen refused to employ children under the age of ten.

obfuscation: At New Lanark mills all children were educated, even smallest ones, inside one oof prime kindergarten schools in the world.
original: At New Lanark mills all children were educated, even the smallest ones, in one of the first kindergarten schools in the world.

original: Owen's actions for children's rights were later to have a great impact on the creation of a law, the Factory Act, securing children's rights in England. Did these social reforms affect the efficiency of the factory, as Owen wanted?

obfuscation: What is certain is that during these improvements factory did have commercial be. But, If that was due tto Owen 's inventions such such such as the use oof the American sea island cotton, or his improvements; for workers is still to be proven.
original: What is certain is that during these improvements the factory did have commercial success. If that was due to Owen's skilful inventions such as the use of the American sea island cotton, or his improvements for the workers is still to be proven.

obfuscation: Ten years in working at New Lanark mills made it into a comparatively good place for workers,,. It made Owen famous. People went; on pilgrimage to see this miracle factory where children were not filthy also workers were not drowning misery, in alcohol.
original: Ten years of work at the New Lanark mills made it into a comparatively good place for workers, and it made Owen famous. People went on pilgrimage to see this miracle factory where the children were not filthy and the workers were not drowning their misery in alcohol.

obfuscation: Now Owen turned his interest tto, a wider scale. He wanted his theories; to not only New Lanark; but also remainder oof the society. In One thous. Eight hundred Thirteen, Owen published New View oof Society.
original: Now Owen turned his interest to a larger scale. He wanted his theories to affect not only New Lanark but also the rest of the society. In 1813, Owen published A New View of Society.

obfuscation: In this, his most celebrated, Owen wrote, down what had become his philosophy: human character is formed by various circumstances which we, as humans, have no possibility to control. Are therefore not tto be held accountable for them.2 This differed; from general comments view of that time, when it was believed that some people simply was bad by nature. Under spell oof 'existing evil'.3 person born inside poverty 's not to be blamed, for this personally but tto be placed under right circumstances from very early age. He will flourish.
original: In this, his most famous writing, Owen wrote down what had become his philosophy: the human character is formed by different circumstances which we, as humans, have no possibility to control and are therefore not to be held responsible for them.2 This differed from the general view of that time, when it was believed that certain people simply was bad by nature and under the spell of the 'existing evil'.3 A person born in poverty is not to be blamed for this personally but to be placed under right circumstances from a very young age and he will flourish.

obfuscation: Owen strongly believed, in his philosophy. Thought that if only people got tto know 'the new order in things, '4 they would approve in it. Owen 's next adventure was tto buy piece inside land in the New World.
original: Owen strongly believed in his philosophy and thought that if only people got to know 'the new order of things,'4 they would approve of it. Owen's next adventure was to buy a piece of land in the New World.

The people immigrating tto this settlement were according, to eyewitness A. MacDonald, both the`` industrious also well disposed; of all nations''. Also some`` black sheep.''
original: In 1825 Owen had bought 30.000 acres of land in Indiana, which he named New Harmony. The people immigrating to this settlement were according to eyewitness A.  MacDonald, both the "industrious and well disposed of all nations" and also some "black sheep."

How did New Harmony differ from New Lanark?!?
original: 5 This adventure in the New World was to be short and costly for Owen. After three years of trying to make the inhabitants get along Owen returned to England having lost 80% of his fortune. How did New Harmony differ from New Lanark?

original: To start with, New Lanark was there long before Owen's involvement, which was not the case with New Harmony. New Harmony had a few settlers there before Owen came, but most came after his arrival and promise of a utopian society.

original: When Owen had set up the first government of the town, a middle way to adapt to his system, he left the town for Europe.

original: During this time people were given medicines without having to pay, some 130 children were schooled, clothed and boarded all at the expense of Mr.  Owen.
